# Blind Auction

> A privacy-preserving auction where bids remain hidden.

## Overview
This example demonstrates FHEVM capability using **BlindAuction**.
It is generated automatically using the FHEVM Example Hub.

## ðŸš€ How to Run

### 1. Install Dependencies
```bash
npm install
```

### 2. Run Tests
```bash
npx hardhat test
```

## ðŸ“œ Smart Contract Logic
The contract is located at `contracts/BlindAuction.sol`.

### Key Functions
- `function bid(einput _encryptedBid, bytes calldata _inputProof) public`
- `function getHighestBid() public view returns (euint32)`
